message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand your interest in the product, but I'm not willing to meet you halfway just yet. I'm willing to compromise, though! How about we meet at $9000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. How about we meet at $8500? That's as low as I'm willing to go.
I understand your concerns, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $9200? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
